name: Cat Rising: Ascension
description:
Welcome to Cat Rising: Ascension.

You control the cat... Wait, you can not control the cat, it jumps as it likes to! However, you control the world around it. Can you help the cat rise to the heights unseen?

Use left and right arrow buttons to move the world.

Press space bar to pause/unpause the game.

Press 'm' to mute/unmute the music.

If the game lags for you in the browser, try downloading a standalone version.

Good luck!

_________________________________________________

Idea, art and music by Aru Kotsuno (t.me/aru_kotsuno)

Programming by Vladimir Goryachev (me)

Made with Godot Engine (godotengine.org)
